mapper.select: SELECT o.order_time, p.product_id, p.name, p.prices, p.mileage, MIN(pi.p_image) AS images FROM orders o INNER JOIN product p ON o.p_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN product_image pi ON p.product_id = pi.p_id WHERE o.u_id = #{uId} GROUP BY o.order_time, p.product_id, p.name, p.prices, p.mileage ORDER BY o.order_time DESC;
